de.eckhartarnold.client
Interface SlideshowListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Caption, CaptionOverlay, ControlPanel 
public interface SlideshowListener

Interface for event listeners of class Slideshow .

Author:
eckhart

Method Summary
 void onFade()
          Called when a new image starts fading in.
 void onShow(int slideNr)
          Called whenever a new slide is displayed.
 void onStart()
          Called when the (automatic) slide show is started.
 void onStop()
          Called when the (automatic) slide show is stopped.
 

Method Detail

onFade

void onFade()
Called when a new image starts fading in. The number of the image that is faded in can be queried via Slideshow.getCurrentSlide onFade() will not be called if fading is disabled or skipped for some other reason!

onShow

void onShow(int slideNr)
Called whenever a new slide is displayed. onShow is only called after fading in has finished and the slide is fully displayed.

Parameters:
slideNr - the number of the slide that is (fully) displayed right now.

onStart

void onStart()
Called when the (automatic) slide show is started.

onStop

void onStop()
Called when the (automatic) slide show is stopped.
